It is appreciated that they have a coffee maker and offer a Continental style breakfast. I was momentarily frustrated not being able to get the hot surface to turn on to cook my meal prepped breakfast, however they left out a few Nutrigrain bars which were enough to hold me over. Loved the place.
This was the 2nd time we've stayed here. Very welcoming hosts, and within walking distance to many things.
The hosts were really nice and responsive! Totally recommend this place :)

This was my first stay in Cinci and this was definitely the perfect place. I was able to park easily right in front of the front door and the neighborhood was very quiet and seemed safe! Lots of great things to explore in close proximity. Vinod and Nikki were super responsive, very sweet, and all-around great hosts! Would happily stay here again.
The location was perfect, it was close to everything we wanted to see in the city. The place was clean and the hosts were very responsive. I would definitely stay again!

I was in Cincinnati for the last leg of a very tiring trip. This home was exactly what I needed. Settled sleeping room and enough of a kitchen that I would have had no problem making a simple soup and sandwich meal. Breakfast and caffeinated beverages were provided too. The chocolate candies were a special treat. The neighborhood had restaurants of all $ levels and ethnic varieties within walking distance. I walked a few blocks for a diner of falafels and fixings.
Vinod & Nikki were in contact with me before I had reached Cincinnati, welcoming me and ensuring I had a city permit for parking my car. I felt well taken care of the entire time I spent in their lower flat.
Very kind clear and easy! cute unique amenities. perfect little basement dwelling.
Stayed for a conference, within walking distance to the convention center. Host was great.

My husband and I were in town for a Bengals game and couldn't have been happier with the accommodations. The property was exactly as described, and we were delighted to find that in addition to the extra amenities detailed in the listing (which were already more than what I'd consider standard, like toiletries, breakfast items, etc.), they even had an adorable minibar by the billiard table stocked with local craft beers and an honor system cash basket! Such a cute touch! We were incredibly grateful for all of the recommendations, from the general tourist recs in the standard communications to specific brunch spot recommendations that we requested. I would both recommend their listing to friends and stay here again.

Great location, close to downtown and the place is spacious and the hosts are very accommodating with snacks and bottled water in the fridge. We will look for this place again when we come back into town

The place was great for our stay! No street noise and super easy to check in!! Vinod and Nikki were extremely responsive and welcoming. Great downtown location close to a lot of great Cincinnati restaurants :)
Fast response, space is clean and as expected! I stayed for an overnight break during a road trip and it didn’t have more or less for what I needed the space for! Thanks!

Vinod and Nikki were super accommodating with check in and always quick to respond! Over the Rhine is a cozy, quiet, quaint part of town and very walkable to downtown! We came up for a Bengals game and it was only a 15min walk to the stadium! I would definitely look to see if Vinod and Nikkis place is available the next time I come to Cincinnati!
We would defiantly stay again. Very nice homey place that is close to downtown. Walking around the area was safe and quiet.
Couldn’t fault it, was perfect location and amenities for us and the price is great. Great hosts in a lovely city I would 100% recommend.
Super location and easy check in. No sitting area to relax in and bare bones kitchen. Couldn’t control temperature in apartment.

This is our third time staying! We love the spacious bottom floor and easy access/parking. Nikki &Vinod are so kind and responsive! They always put me at ease. I cannot think of a better Airbnb that have stayed at!
would definitely stay again :)

WOW!! Me and my partner stayed here for a show and it was absolutely amazing! Firstly, Vinod and Nikki are absolutely lovely and extremely helpful if you need suggestions! Secondly the location was absolutely AMAZING!! Everything is so close you could walk everywhere but even if you drive, the parking is extremely convenient and easy at Vinod and Nikki’s as well as the rest of the area! 100/10 the stay was lovely and everything was so warm and cozy with many blanket options! Will definitely return :)

Highly recommend! We were a short drive away from most anything we wanted to do. Nikki and Vinod were very accommodating hosts, even leaving breakfast options! Even though we didn’t use it, the common area had a pool table, dart board and even an adorable bar with options to buy beer and wine; wonderful touch!

A very nice place to stay that is well within walking distance of everything you can imagine downtown! Vinod and Nikki will always answer the phone if you have any difficulties or questions. They have a clean and well kept place for you stay. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here and will be back next time I am in Cincinnati! Easily 5 stars guaranteed

Loved our stay at this spot. Super close to everything, the hosts are easy to communicate with and the check in/out was seamless.
I think it is important to note that it is the basement of the hosts house and you will be able to hear them and their children talking/walking around. Did not bother me, but I did not see any reviews talking on that so felt it was important to note. You will hear them.
The location was perfect, price was wonderful and the hosts are very easy to communicate with.
I enjoyed the little touches they had of the breakfast/snack options and having coffee.
The pool table and record player was a fun little addition!
Would come here again.
Very clean cute and comfortable, I highly recommend
Very clean and friendly, easy parking and easy to find!
very welcoming and clean place. great location and in walking distance to almost everything. check in was very easy.

do not hesitate and book this space! it's in a perfect and safe part of town. walking distance to a lot of great places. very comfortable bed and so many thoughtful and useful extras they offer. would absolutely stay here again if we're in the area.

When you consider the free parking and the fact that this place is within walking distance to everywhere cool, it's an amazing value! And on top of that, it's private, comfy and is stocked with everything you need to help economize on food while you are in town (small refrig, microwave, some snacks). I would gladly stay again!
This is our second stay and we love the location in OTR. As a repeat guest we can highly recommend.
Great stay! Last minute booking and they were able to accommodate. Thanks! No complaints.
I recommend staying.
Great location, excellent communication, very clean. Would definitely stay again.

This is a prime OTR spot! The pool table and dart board were so fun and relaxing, and I don't often say this but the BED WAS SO COMFORTABLE (it came with a heated blanket!) This spot was lowkey and lovely, and we would recommend it for anyone looking for wonderful hosts, a laid back vibe and a great location!

Vinod and Nikki are fantastic hosts. The property is in a safe area conveniently close to many places around town. Vinod and Nikki were excellent communicators and made check-in and my stay in general a total breeze. I really appreciated the privacy that this rental offers along with the complimentary breakfast snacks and water the hosts provided. There is also an honor system mini-bar in the pool table room, which I thought was a very thoughtful touch. Would definitely recommend.
Beautiful neighborhood, great space, thoughtful and caring hosts. Would stay here again
We had a great time! Great and safe location. Can’t wait to come back again.
Very cool space in an awesome location. Nikki and Vinod are great with communication and have lots of personal touches throughout the apartment. Would definitely stay here again!
Great location, comfortable accommodations. Would stay there again.
Great space! Convenient to lots of what Cincinnati has to offer. Quiet and very comfortable. Really enjoyed the space.

This well-appointed basement apartment is in a perfect location within a short walking distance of all the sights that Cincinnati offers.
The hosts communicate quickly and have breakfast options available. Self check-in is super easy. Great value too!
Such a rad spot! Even better than the pics! Will def be back. Cheers!

We had an amazing stay at the Carriage House in early May. The place is beautiful, comfortable, and served as the perfect home base for wondering around OTR and Cincinnati on foot. The unit is gorgeous, we really loved the aesthetic of the interior - the shower and bath are as good as they look in the pics. Waking up to all the natural light that floods the bedroom and birds chirping was amazing and stepping out into a brick cobble stone alley covered in vines is the perfect way to start off your day.

Great little spot in OTR. Everything is realistically walkable/accessible. Bar Saeso was very cool. Everyone in town loves it! Christy was very fast and efficient getting back to me about anything and everything. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay. Coming back to Cincy next month and will likely book again!

Chris' AirBnB was BEAUTIFUL! Great location, easy parking, easy to access, all the accommodations one would need. They were extremely responsive. Loved every minute of our stay. Absolutely give them the HIGHEST recommendation!!!!

While the pictures I viewed online were absolutely breathtaking, I was even more blown away when I saw this lovely home in person. Everything is immaculate and love the creative touches all over the house. The Taco food truck and the Bar Saeso right next to the carriage house enhances the experience, making our stay really fun. The bathtub is a cherry on top and everyone must take full advantage of it. Overall, it was an amazing experience and I highly recommend booking this gem of a place.

The Carriage House is a perfect spot to call home while exploring all the great places in downtown Cincinnati. Walkable to great restaurants, shops and parks. The space is roomy, stylishly decorated and very clean. Parking is just out the door and very easy. There’s a great bar with a taco truck and patio right next door. The hosts were great to work with and everything went very smoothly. Would recommend highly!

Gorgeous home in a perfect area. Everything is walkable and we enjoyed a drink from Bar Saeso next door each night. Christy gave us the heads up that there would be music from their patio until 10pm, but it wasn’t loud and actually gave a nice ambiance. Given that the bedroom is upstairs, it was no disturbance at all. I can’t recommend this place enough - don’t hesitate!
Fantastic place!
Wonderful place to stay. Great host!
The Carriage House was a great spot for couples and socializing. The pictures are an accurate expectation of the space.
The place was amazing as can be!

The Carriage House is just as pictured and described. It felt very luxurious, comfy, and clean. The bathtub was incredible and the water piping hot. Christy was so prompt in her responses and answering any questions. As others said, parking is tight, but awesome to have a free place downtown. The location is so convenient and close to so many great food and drink places. The included bath amenities, cooking items and utensils, and extra linens were lovely. Our stay made for an excellent last minute weekend away!

Clean,convenient, comfortable.
Nice spot for business travelers as well.

If you stopped to look at this place, just go ahead and book it. The Carriage House is a beautiful apartment with a stylish kitchen, cozy and open-spaced bedroom, and a bathroom straight out of Emerald City. The hosts are fantastic and hospitable. With a bar 10 feet from your doorstep and a whole block worth of activities down an alley, this stay was exceptional on every level.

This place was beautiful!! Loved the location. The parking alley is a bit narrow nice to not have to pay for parking. I recommend a sleep mask due to the sky light. But overall the experience was wonderful! Will definitely stay here again.
This is the perfect place to stay in Cincinnati. Clean, stylish, great location, and Christy is a great host! I will book this house again!

Amazing and beautiful place to stay! My girlfriend and I spent the weekend there and we’ve already said we’d stay again next time we come to Cincinnati. So many things to do around the place. Kitchen was beautiful, bathroom was beautiful. Loved every second of our stay.

Let me say this! This place is a must! The pictures show that it’s beautiful but in person OMG it’s beautiful! This place was very clean and neat and in walking distance of many places. My boyfriend and I celebrated my birthday by just getting away and chilling out and this was well worth it. We will be back very soon definitely!

This place is lovely. We will stay again. It is so cozy and I imagine in the summer it would be so cheerful.
Tons of windows and lovely light. The bed is amazingly comfortable and smells beautiful.
We made dinner and stored our food in the mini-fridge with no issues.
Having Bar Saeso next door is such a great perk, so if you're like me and staying there with kids, you can still get some great drinks just steps away.
We chose this spot because we know the area but there is still so much to explore. the weather kept us inside most of the time but I want to stay again when we can enjoy the area as much as we did the Carriage House.
A luxurious stay!

Definitely the best Airbnb experience I have ever had. This place is a total GEM, I almost don't want to tell too many people about it ;) Christy was such a responsive, friendly and helpful host. I will be back for sure.
Incredible.
Great place to stay, plenty of places to go & all in walking distance
Beautiful space. Perfect for our needs. Parking was very convenient. Close to many attractions. Definitely recommended!!
Christy's place is incredible. The style, comfort, and location are impossible to beat. Christy communicates very quickly and we wanted for nothing. Can't recommend this place enough.

This place is so gorgeous, relaxing, and in such a great area of town. The hosts are beyond helpful and great at communicating. This is the absolute best place to stay if you want to visit Cincinnati!
Place is absolutely amazing!! Great hosts!!

We had a wonderful, romantic weekend at The Carriage House! The space itself is beautiful--just like the photos--and it's in a great location. Just a short walk to restaurants, shopping, etc. Check-in was very easy, and we appreciated the clear instructions left behind by the hosts. A few things potential guests should note: 1) The parking spot is in a narrow alleyway, so getting in and out is a little challenging (but not too bad!) 2) This guesthouse is right next door to a bar (which we did not visit but looked very nice) that has outdoor seating. If there are people sitting outside, you will hear them. 3) If you're staying during a colder month, the heat definitely rises to the second level, but does not reach the bottom floor as well. However, none of these small things really affected our stay very much, and we truly enjoyed our time in this beautiful place!
This place is EXCELLENT! Beautifully designed as indicated in the pics. Very clean and well-kept. Great accessibility to OTR food and activities. I highly recommend staying here!

This place is stunning. Artful, tasteful, and super cozy and lush. The couch, the bed, the claw foot tub....lush. Perfect location, walking distance to great food and shopping. Wonderful hostess. Quick response.
Second time here. Still 5 out of 5 stars. Extremely clean.
The house is amazing, it was the perfect place to spend thanksgiving week. Spacious, so well designed, super comfortable bed, incredible bathroom, just great.

This is the airbnb all other airbnbs want to be when they grow up! Top to bottom, this cozy carriage house does not disappoint. The bathroom is definitely the star of the show; if you're not using that tub, you're missing out. Also loved the new addition of Saeso right next door (also designed by the host). This was the perfect spot to stop at the end of the night!
This space was perfect. Christy was an awesome host and was able to respond to any questions I had in a matter of minutes. HIGHLY recommend this gorgeous house.

Loved the bathroom for relaxing in the tub! All around stylish, spacious and clean. Perfect for a weekend getaway. In the heart of it all, not secluded so a little noisy. The thick drapes made it cozy and allowed me to get great rest -comfortable bed too! Parking was tight in the alley, but my minivan did fit. Thanks!
Lovely space and perfect location!
Beautiful space in OTR near plenty of things to walk to. Everything in this house is just gorgeous!
A gorgeous space!

This is a wonderfully appointed and historic space. There are too many amazing touches to name, with the bathtub and expansive windows being my favorites. It’s a beautiful mix of modern and historic. The area is very up and coming with lots of small quirky shops and bars within walking distance. We can’t wait to come back!
Perfect location with gorgeous decor. Wonderful communication, going above and beyond. Easy check in and check out. Perfect stay!

We stayed for 5 nights and felt very comfortable at the Carriage House. It was very clean and had all the conveniences and comfort of home and more. The design and layout are open and refreshing, and the finishing touches are top notch. The Bedroom is large and the bed is amazingly comfortable. This is one of our favorite places to stay! We walked the nearby pedestrian bridge, and just steps out the front door is a cute and quaint place called Bar Saeso, which you must check out! Amazing cocktails. Our host, Christy, was attentive and easy to contact if we needed her. We will be back!
Well maintained, pictures are accurate.

Amazing stay! Gorgeous space, every detail accounted for! Perfect location. Every room was immaculate and well designed. I wanted for nothing, from soaps to steamer everything I needed was on site. Can’t wait to come again, if you get the chance stay here!
Beautiful space. Great hosts that responded immediately when we messaged. Great location near lots of bars and restaurants. Parking was easy. Great bathtub and linens.
The Carriage House OTR is a literal dream. Excellent location, gorgeous interior and all the nice touches from an excellent host. Highly recommend!
The carriage house is stunning. The detail put into the space is incredible and makes you feel like you are truly on vacation. Christy is very responsive and helpful. We can’t wait to stay again!
This is the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in. Pure class. Exactly like the photos.

I really loved the style of the apartment and the the space in general. All the rooms were large and it had a great feel. It was stocked with all the essentials and the kitchen was amazing. It was in a nicer part of OTR and close to downtown. Would definitely stay here again.

Had an amazing experience at the Carriage House! The styling is stunning and the home is located within walking distance to many restaurants. Parking was very convenient and the host provides great, easy to read instructions.

Beautiful space and area is close to adult bars and restaurants. The carriage house is immaculate and romantic for a night in. The claw foot tub is spacious and the shower is huge. The bed is like sleeping on a cloud.
Christy's place is a hidden gem in OTR!!!
We were blown away when we first walked in The Carriage House and realized it was even cooler in person! Great location, great decor - perfect little home away from home.
Perfect little spot for a staycation getaway. The atmosphere was lovely, Christy was fast to respond, and the bathtub is great. Highly recommend!

This house is the perfect place to stay in Cincinnati for couples, friends, or a small family. It is super close to amazing restaurants like LouVino and coffee shops and about a 15 min walk to Fountain square and Findley Market. This airbnb was the cleanest I have ever stayed in, seriously! The big bathtub and walk in shower was perfect to end the day with. Everything is decorated and styled with charm and modern touches. We loved just sitting in the living room/kitchen and drinking some wine and watching tv in the evening or listening to music, which they have a great speaker btw. You also get to park in the private alley right next to the house, which is such a huge perk in downtown Cincinnati. I hate trying to find parking and it was nice to just pull and leave the car with no worries. We can't wait to stay again!
A beautiful space, feels nice and cozy. It’s also in a perfect location to explore the city and it’s nightlife
A great mix of comfort with beautiful design. A great space to enjoy being in whilst being in a great location to explore the city. Highly recommended.
The Carriage House is absolutely beautiful -- a gem tucked away in OTR. Everything about our stay was perfect -- easy check-in, wonderful location, and sparkling clean.

Excellent location and space. The amenities are perfect and make for a very relaxing private getaway. Christy was very responsive and helped us out whenever we had any questions. Location was near lots of food options and easily walkable. Such a great stay!

This place was awesome! Just great communication with Christy. The living room/ kitchen area is great for having people over and entertaining them and they also have blinds on the windows for privacy for the alley when people walk by and such.
The location is actually prime. Near enough to be close to all the cool restaurants and bars but far enough away to have some nice quiet and privacy. It was a great time. Totally perfect for a little weekend getaway .

Christy's carriage house is a truly beautiful and stylish retreat. The space is airy and full of natural light, the decor is elegant and very much of the moment, the bed is wonderful, and the bathroom has great water pressure--we very much appreciated the hot shower during our snowy visit. There are thoughtful touches throughout, and Christy is very responsive to requests for more information. The lodging is within Cincinnati's bustling OTR district, and also just steps from the attractive Pendleton neighborhood, with great breweries and cafes. Parking isn't an issue, with options in the alley that abuts the house, as well as a parking lot just beyond the door. Folks who don't get up early should be aware there is a significant constuction project underway within the next block, but we had no real issues with construction noise. If you have a chance to book Christy's carriage house, do so!

Great location and a very cool place to stay. Big enough to have some friends meet us and socialize. Fantastic location within walking distance of several restaurants and bars. Easy access to all the key areas downtown. Easy parking and loved our morning walk to grab a Sunday brunch! Would highly recommend as a great place to stay to enjoy Cincinnati!
Beautiful place! It is one of the best places I stayed in Cincinnati

A beautiful, comfortable place! My husband and I absolutely loved our stay. Sparkling clean and beautifully decorated. The bed was so comfortable, towels were luxurious, and we very much appreciated the extra touches such as granola bars and fruit and nice lotion/bath products. We will definitely stay again!
The carriage house was so gorgeous, great location and sparking clean!!
Wonderful experience.
Spotless. Interesting. Upscale. Contemporary. Hidden gem.

The Carriage House was so lovely. The space is swanky yet homey. Every detail is thoughtful, and we felt like we were at a grand hotel. As an AirBnB superhost myself, I have a critical eye, and I give this place an A+. We wished we could’ve stayed another night. Pro tip: if you can back in the alley for parking it’s a safer exit when you’re ready to leave.
5 stars all the way! what a special place- will be back!

I booked The Carriage House for photoshoots and it was even more gorgeous in person! The location is great as it is in walking distance to some of my favorite OTR spots! The space is so well thought out and it makes you feel like you walked into a catalog! I am looking forward to the next weekend I have booked!
Perfect, stylish spot for hosting out-of-town visitors.
This place is stunning. Whether it's a romantic getaway or a weekend with your friends, this is an amazing place to stay.

This place is unbelievable. The pictures looked amazing, but the actual space is even better than it looks. The whole house is so thoughtfully designed... don’t even get me started on the bathroom. Pendleton is a great neighborhood - close to OTR and pretty much anything you’d want to do in Cincy. You’re a quick walk down the alley from coffee, beer and biscuits. Can’t wait to stay here again. 100% recommend.

Absolutely terrific space. Gorgeous design, all the extras including coffee, tea, granola, fresh fruit, great bath products, fluffy high-grade towels, pillows, etc. I really loved the beauty and great condition of everything, including great parking!

To call this place stylish is actually a gigantic understatement—it’s really stunning. The proximity to OTR is unbeatable—so many great restaurants and bars within a few minutes’ walk! (The neighborhood can be a little bit noisy here and there, so keep that in mind if it’s a problem for you.)

We booked the Carriage House for our wedding weekend. We wanted a place that would look great for photos and be centralized to our city (Cincinnati) and venue (Northside). The photos online are great, but the place in person is even better. The entire house is tucked away in the alleys of the city making it feel rustic and almost like walking the streets of New Orleans. The interior is beautiful and cozy. The bathroom upstairs is absolutely gorgeous. I know that is a weird thing to review but, seriously, amazing. And the bedroom is quiet, spacious, and the bed is insanely comfortable. Would love to stay here again when we can. Hosts were very responsive and welcoming. Would recommend to anyone looking for a fun place to stay in Cincinnati.
Great location and phenomenal house!
Great place!
This house is top notch! Very clean, stylish and the location is great! I'm new to Airbnb and Christy was a huge help! Very professional and caring. Highly recommend!
I was in town with family for a wedding and am so happy with my experience here. The home was clean, modern, and beautiful, and the location couldn't have been better!

The Carriage House was a great place to celebrate our one year wedding anniversary! The decor was romantic and luxurious. The bathroom was everything you could possibly hope for and more. We would definitely stay here again if the opportunity presented itself! A beautiful find near the heart of OTR.

We stayed over the weekend, and loud music was being played the majority of the day and night but that doesn’t take away how stylish and clean the property was. Location was great and bed was super comfy. Christy was a very responsive and thoughtful host. Overall a 5 star stay.
Such a perfect place! Walking distance to everything- super clean- loved all the touches. Lots of space!

Beautiful space, fantastic location- would definitely stay again.
The Carriage House is terrific place to stay in the heart of OTR area. Convenient to downtown, Great American Ball Park and all things OTR.

Excellent location, spacious and well-lit space, responsive and accommodating host, and beautiful design. I can’t imagine what more anyone could be looking for in an AirBnb. Crossing my fingers for another reason to visit Cincinnati soon *just* so I can stay again.
Very cool space. Finding the entrance was a little tricky, but once you’re there it’s prime location. Well within walking distance from a lot of restaurants/stores in surrounding otr.

Beautiful space. Stayed here for the jazz fest. Not the easiest to find but once there it was central to everything that we wanted to do. Would definitely stay there again, great space for a couple's getaway.

Christy’s place is just as stunning in real life as the photos show, and a delightful space to wake up.
Decor was phenomenal- every last touch, from the plush sofa to the luxurious bedding.

I have visited dozens of Airbnb’s over the past 6-7 years and this is easily one of the nicest. Highly recommended. Thank you Christy!
Fantastic place and in a great location in OTR. Exactly as pictured and described on line. Would stay here again in the future.

Had a great stay here! Recently celebrated an anniversary and was excited to find this spot. There was so much to love about this place! Large mirror, large comfortable bed, and a skylight in the bedroom! Wonderful claw foot tub and spacious shower. I also enjoyed watching a movie downstairs!
Wish I could put a 10 star ! Especially for communication. I’m in the city often and I will definitely be back again if I’m staying around this area. Thanks again!

A very stylish place perfectly placed to walk to all sorts of neat spots. The bathroom is awesome and the king bed is super comfy. Christy's place was AMAZING. So beautifully decorated, clean and in an awesome location. We will be staying again.
Beautiful, comfortable, and in a great location!

Fantastic space in a lovely, tucked-away part of the neighborhood. Christy and her team did a great job making the unit feel very rich and luxe. And the location is accessible to anything and everything you want in downtown/OTR. Will visit again.
Great place to entertain a few people!
We loved everything about The Carriage House. It was so stylish and fun. Great location, we walked everywhere. Convenient parking. Definitely would stay there again!

Great place! Love the decor and style, and the location was perfect for going to a concert at Taft Theater and then going out to a few bars in OTR. Would highly recommend and would definitely stay again!
Gorgeous, newly renovated spot with just the right touch of thoughtful delicacy. Great location near OTR, coffee shops and restaurants. Quiet mornings with the sound of church bells to wake to.
The most beautiful space. So inspiring and lovely. Couldn’t ask for anything better.
What an amazing house! Such a beautiful place to stay, and very close to lots of fun restaurants.
A cut above the rest! I was blown away with the space and hospitality! It was perfect!
What a beautiful and wonderful place! Great location to OTR and all the popular local places.

Gorgeous design, plenty of space and in the perfect location in the heart of OTR!

This place was so amazing! It was spacious, beautiful, and in the best area. Parking was easy and I was able to check in myself. Christy had the best local recommendations. I will definitely be back to stay here again when I come to town for work!
Great experience and nice house!

The Carriage House is so cute! This was my second visit to Cincinnati and I wanted to stay in OTR where all the adorable bars and restaurants are. The location could not have been better for exploring the area- you can walk to absolutely everything! Inside the house is beautiful and sparkling clean. It feels like a luxurious hotel suite on the inside disguised as a quaint historic carriage house on the outside. A hidden gem in the middle of the city. Good coffee, parking, and Christy was super helpful and quick to respond to my questions. I will definitely be back!

The Carriage House is the best place to stay in Cincinnati hands down. Awesome location, super cool design, comfortable bed, easy parking, all the amenities. Why anyone would stay in a hotel when you can have a whole luxury house to yourself in the coolest part of the city is beyond me. Definitely stay here.

The Carriage House was an unbelievably beautiful space. The location is perfect for all areas of OTR and Pendleton, also a scooter ride away from downtown or the banks. It was amazing to have parking right outside, and we were able to cook all meals at the house. The bathtub was a wonderful addition to our lovely stay! I’d very much recommend this space for a downtown Cincinnati weekend getaway.

From private parking, to easy check in, the moments leading up to our arrival were a piece of cake! The first time opening the door and stepping in-- WOW! The photos are exactly what you are getting. It was a little paradise in the heart of OTR, and was a great little weekend stay-cation for a Cincinnati native. The giant bathroom and bedroom were perfect for a romantic night, and the little personal touches made it feel like a second home. Do yourself a favor and experience this beautiful place!

This is a beautiful space! I chose it for the location downtown near popular restaurants and museums. We were able to park for free which is a bonus because parking downtown can be a challenge. If you don’t need a car, it’s easy to use Uber/Lyft.
The bedroom and bathroom are spacious and come with great shampoos, conditioners and soaps.
The living room and kitchen area is very comfortable. I really enjoyed the stay!

This is an awesome property! If you are looking for luxury than this is the place. Communication with Christy was perfect. I called her twice and she answered. Not having to leave a voicemail is great guest service. Also texted her a couple of times and had a reply within minutes. We had dinner at Boca and I highly recommend it!
Gorgeous and historic carriage house. Beautiful touches really enhance the experience. Within walking distance to so many fun places! Thanks for having us!

WOW. That's all I can say about Christy's flat. The best location in Cincy with the absolutely GORGEOUS apartment. Winning combo. Christy is an incredible host with very quick responses. The personal touches to the apartment really made the place feel like home. Easy check in and out (which is perfect for those arriving a bit later) and easy to find with private parking. All around this was an amazing experience. I will definitely be back here the next time I'm in Cinncinnati. Thanks Christy!
Christy’s space was amazing. This location is perfect if you want to experience “OTR” neighborhood. The location is very walkable and is close to great restaurants. I highly recommend this home.
Great apartment and great location! Walkable to everything we wanted to see and do.
Absolutely stunning place! Great neighborhood with plenty within walking distance! Love this place!
Beautiful home, had a great night there as a family. Would definitely recommend, loved the view and rooftop access

Beautiful place with a beautiful view. So close to everything and easy to access. Interior was very clean and looked amazing. Was a great trip. Will definitely stay here again when we visit.
This place was amazing. There were balconies on each floor and room. Loved how the place was decorated. Beautiful!
Hands down a beautiful home in a very great location. Just a few minutes away from just about everything. Great views! Definitely worth the experience!
Great place to stay
This is an absolutely STUNNING place to stay and the views are amazing of the city! The place was beautiful and locations was great in Mt Adams!
This place was excellent! It had a great view and very peaceful! I would stay here again!
Perfect. Peaceful. Pristine.

Drew’s space was beautiful! The view was absolutely gorgeous. The pictures don’t give the space the justice it deserves. The steam shower was exactly what was needed to relieve some stress and rejuvenate. Perfect for a couple’s getaway.

Excellent Home. Thank you

Amazing! Great location and a fantastic space. I visited for my sister’s graduation with my parents and my nieces. It was a great hosting space for us to be able to hang out and visit with our family.

Space was absolutely beautiful. Would definitely stay again, we had a little issue as there was no parking in the driveway as advertised - but we were able to find parking on the street. Drew's team was very responsive and came addressed any issue within 10 minutes.
Thanks for the great stay!
Absolutely beautiful place. Will definitely be back.
We definitely enjoyed our stay. Everything was clean and the kitchen, especially, was well stocked.
We had a great stay at Drew’s! Gorgeous, unique apartment with stunning views. Looked like the photos! Would stay again.
Drew is seriously a 5 star host. Every property is immaculate. When booking within the city I always look for his properties first! Highly recommend!
Great rooftop patio with comfortable seating. Decorated beautifully and comfortable

This is the second of Drew’s listings we have stayed in, and as always the attention to detail in his properties is truly top notch. This unit is absolutely stunning, and every amenity you could need for your stay is thought of! Will definitely stay again in the future!
Drew was a great host! Commutation was great and air bnb was exactly what we thought.
This is the most beautiful house. The views are beyond amazing. We got ready here for my wedding weekend and it could not have been a more perfect day.

Great place and host! Will definitely book again if in the area.

Beautiful townhome and great common areas for a group. For a group of 6, it was a little unclear from the listing how many beds there were - the 3rd bed was a futon that would have only slept 1 person, so the 6th person had to sleep on a couch. Not ideal, but we still enjoyed our stay.
Great host. Responsive, honest and spot on.

What a beautiful home to enjoy a short getaway in Cincinnati. Drew was amazing and quick to respond. Everything was a breeze to finding the location to getting in and enjoying the great A/C. Beautiful home near downtown Cincy. Several restaurants and bars within walking distance. Gorgeous views. Beautiful interior design. Incredible kitchen with amazing gas range. Parking in driveway which is awesome for this area. Very short drive to ball park or Paycor stadium. Highly recommend.

While the house is pet friendly, be prepared to walk your dogs several blocks to the nearest patch of green space.

This is a 5 star ai r bnb!! It was a beautiful location! We truly enjoyed our stay!

Gorgeous spot with amazing views! The home is located in a very nice residential area adjacent to a large park system and my favorite art museum. Drew is a great host and very responsive. Communication is prompt and thorough.

We travel a lot for business and this home made our stay very pleasurable. We can’t wait to come back.
It was a joy for me to spend several days here working on writing I’m doing with beautiful view! I’ll be back!
Peaceful area , great views ! Condo was decorated beautifully and exceptionally clean.

Absolutely hands down the most amazing Airbnb I have ever stayed in and I hesitate to say that as I don't want to lose any opportunity to book in the future. Fair is fair.
The amenities were exactly what we would look for in a five star hotel.
The architecture was clever and functional with constant discovery and the views were breathtaking. I am hoping to learn the name of the architect. The home was THAT beautiful.
This place was amazing. Every level of the house was breath taking. Can't wait to stay again.

Amazing AirBnB!! We were only there for one night & regret not having more time in this beautiful place! Quick 7 minute Uber to the Ballpark & hands down the rooftop is the best place in Cincinnati to have your morning coffee.
Drew is a great host & the place is better than the picts and description. One of the best we have stayed at.

i will be renting from drew again when i come back !

Incredible view. Beautiful home.

Yeah this is one of the best Airbnb’s we’ve stayed in, and we travel all over. This place was just so cool, the rain head shower, excellent kitchen with outdoor deck and grill, the living room area and beautiful master. Absolute top notch. Hoping we can stay again in the future next time we’re passing through Cincinnati.

Beautiful, well appointed home. Home has great entertaining spaces, layout lends itself to having space for 2 groups (i.e. kids and adults) to enjoy separate leisure spaces, nice views, great outdoor spaces, and a responsive host.
Note: This home has a lot of stairs. The stairs from the foyer to the 1st living have an average rise. Those with mobility issues (walker, wheelchair, etc) may find this listing difficult.
Amazing home! Gorgeous views, beautifully decorated and exceptionally clean. Drew was a wonderful host- immediately responsive and accommodating. By far this was the nicest Air BNB we’ve ever stayed.
Great location, great view. Stayed one night but the amenities were adequate.
The apartment was beautiful and fully stocked for cooking. We had a great time with our dog and hope to be back again!

Fabulous one bedroom loft. It's on the 4th floor but worth every step. Immaculate, nicely furnished, great shower and super comfy bed. The decor is top notch and there is natural light a plenty. Great blackout blinds too, I slept so well. Perfect for a couple.

We were in town to see a soccer match, and this place was within easy walking distance of the stadium. We were only one block away from catching a free street car system which allowed us to see all of the Over-the-Rhine area including all the way down to the Banks. The location of this place is perfect.
As for the apartment itself, it is absolutely amazing. It is worth every step of the four flights up to it. Easy directions to get in, and Harman was always quick to respond. The beautiful brick walls and sky lights and bathrooms and comfortable bed made it so homey and welcoming. There are extra blankets and towels. There is a large walk-in closet to put your suitcases and clothes. The kitchen was fully stocked with dishes, utensils, etc. Not that we really used anything as we ate out for every meal because we wanted to explore and experience as much as we could, and it didn't disappoint. This place is, well, perfect. I wouldn't change a thing about it.
Gorgeous space, clean and in an amazing location. The stairs are definitely a hike but worth it for the great space!

The space is perfect for a long weekend in Cincinnati. It is minutes to basically everything in over the Rhine and the views are nice. The stairs to get to the 4th floor are a lot, but it was not an issue for us even after running the marathon
Cute place in the OTR region of the city. Close to everything and the parking spot was great bonus
Fantastic space and within walking distance to many restaurants. bars, and the market. Be warned of the stairs, though! They are alot when carrying luggage up. Parking spot a real plus.
Easy to find/ access, felt homey within the neighbourhood

We had a lovely stay in Cincinnati! Harman’s loft was absolutely gorgeous and very conveniently located. Having a reserved parking spot was very helpful, although we barely used our car because everything was extremely walkable. The loft is also about a half block from the free streetcar access, which we used many times.
The loft itself was extremely clean and beautifully decorated. The building is gorgeous and full of character! Harman was a great host and was very responsive and helpful.

Extremely simple. No issues with the check in or check out. The apartment has a cool, industrial loft vibe with the brick walls. It’s on the 4th floor so there is a nice view. No issues with my stay whatsoever. Thanks.
Quiet area and lovely interior. Great view at the stadium light. It looks like a lantern from the bedroom. Clean and actually useable cookware in the kitchen. The host is very communicative.

This place is a great location. We could walk to several restaurants and bars. Harman was very responsive. We were able to check in early to avoid some bad weather. The only hang up is that the loft is on the fourth floor with no elevator. It was hard to get our luggage in and out. But, we made it work. Overall, we had a great experience,

Harman’s loft is stunning! It was exactly how she described it and looked like the photos. It’s spacious, pretty well appointed, and clutter free. It has 1.5 baths, which is great! Harman is a very kind and considerate host who was easy to communicate with and responded quickly. Amazing views of Music Hall and TQL Stadium. Walkable to great restaurants, shops, coffee, parks, etc. I’m originally from Cincinnati but moved away in 1992. When I visit family here, we love staying in OTR. Harman enabled me to see parts of Cincinnati that were not safe to visit when I lived here. She is very clear in the Decatur the stairs. Very doable and worth every step. Parking is a little tight with a bigger vehicle. I just backed in from the street and it was easy peasy. I walked everywhere and didn’t take the tram once. I felt very safe (this trip I was traveling solo) and I loved the street car sounds. Felt like I was in Europe. You won’t regret staying in Harman’s loft. We will def return! ❤️
Great views and location.

This apartment is beautiful and the bed was very comfortable. It is a great find. Easy walk to the Findley market and other Over the Rhine neighborhood gems. The host communicated well. Would definitely recommend.
Beautiful space and absolutely perfect Cincinnati location. The views of the city are iconic. Would absolutely stay again!
One of the best Airbnb’s we have stayed in and the neighborhood is fantastic!

Great location! Close to a connector spot which was convenient. We walked everywhere when it wasn’t snowing. The loft had everything we needed and kitchen was well stocked. Felt at home. Didn’t mind being on the 4th floor. Harman was quick to respond and always helpful. Extremely happy we stayed here overall.

An absolute gem on Elm St with unique historic features and stunning views. Super walkable neighborhood with many restaurants, bars, and attractions nearby. We only moved our car once & enjoyed walking through Washington Park to break up our walks. We had a peaceful stay and can’t wait to visit OTR again!
A very cute place to stay in OTR! The parking spot is great and everything is an easy walk away. The apartment is beautiful with a great view.

Great location! Super walkable to the best spots in over the rhine! The pictures don’t do it justice. It was far better than we expected!
Host was very responsive to a few minor issues.
We had a great stay!

Great location! Was so nice to be able to bring our pups for a weekend getaway. The park nearby was perfect for walks. Was nice to have a parking spot. Great local bars (did an awesome food tour) and easy access to the highway!
Wonderful space and location!

5 night stay! Pros- Easy walk to the game, restaurants, & music hall. Nice architecture. Nice to have a washer/dryer.
Cons-Unit looked fairly clean, but it was dusty/dirty. We questioned if/when any deep cleanings had been done. Bathroom drawers had used toothpaste and qtips that were loose in the drawers, half empty bottles under the sinks, closet full of cleaning supplies.The bdrm closet cluttered with sheets and comforters, not your typical blankets but bags of bedding. There were 2 ironing boards one broken which is why they had two, not sure why you keep the broken one. There is 1 closet for clothes, no dresser. They provide hangers - plastic,wire and some of those free ones you get when you buy clothes. The cabinets in the kitchen had leftover food, it was a bit of a mess so we used one shelf. Knives were very dull. Sofa had stains, and not comfortable. Dining table is small high-top, seats 2 at best. Owner should get another cleaning service, and buy a dresser. Parking is tight.

I stayed one night to watch the FCC game. So close to TQL stadium! I appreciated the location, easy parking, easy to find lock box, and character of the place. I could hear and see noisy people socializing, on the balcony directly across the street by the bed, but it's a city on a Saturday night, so it might just be part of the territory. Overall, a comfortable stay!
Loved our stay as we could walk everywhere and it was super close to the park! The entire place was the perfect loft for a city stay.
very cool decoration and gorgeous views of the city. Location is perfect as well, especially if you have your dog with you.
Great location and great place to stay
Very convenient location. We had a short but very pleasant stay.

We went for a show at the Cincinnati music hall. The airbnb was the perfect location making a night out very walkable and easy to get around. Will definitely consider staying here again in the future!
fantastic spot in OTR. the place was cozy and had great views. I would recommend to anyone that is looking for a cool spot in Cincy.

Harman's airbnb was the perfect stay-- this description, the location, the cleanliness were all as described. The space very bright and airy. And, easy to get around to all the restaurants and popular spots along Vine Street. HIghly recommend, and would stay here again.
The place was absolutely stunning! Clear instructions for entry, amazing view, super clean and overall very house warming. We would love to come back!! Host was amazing!
Great place, well decorated and updated inside.
Second time staying here while in town for a recruiting event at UC. Amazing location and great loft space. Highly recommend.
Great location. Very walkable to OTR restaurants and bars. Easy off-street parking.

Harman's place was exactly as described. It is very walkable to all the activity in the OTR. We stayed for a Bengal's Monday night game and it was right under 1 mile to the stadium. It took us about 20 min to walk. When we arrived, we had issues with getting in but Harman called us in less than a minute and was able to get us in promptly with no delay! There are many stairs, but we knew that - so no surprise there! We like the exercise anyway and her loft apartment was worth the climb. It was our own little oasis for the night in beautiful Cincinnati. Because it wad a Monday night, not much was open after the game. But we found a late night Mexican place called Taco Lab that delivered late night on doordash after the game. The food was excellent.
Will definitely consider staying here again, was perfect to walk over to the stadium for the UWNT game! Great location, clean and spacious place!

Great spot in fun neighborhood with view of stadium. Parking spot was tight fit for my pickup, and walk up might not be for everyone, but really funky apartment close to lots of restaurants and culture.

This was our second visit to Harman’s condo and our 4th visit to the loft. We love OTR. Harman’s condo stands out for its cleanliness, her positive and quick responses and you can’t discount the quick 25 minute walk to Paycor and Great America Ball Park. We will be back next season. Who-Dey!

Such a beautiful + classic space in an old urban neighborhood!!! Beautiful city views. Close to many fun places. Felt very much like home!!
Would definitely stay there again!
This was a beautiful place to stay! The condo is in a perfect location. It’s a huge bonus to have a parking place. Highly recommend!

This was an incredibly clean and gorgeous apartment. I loved the fact that it was a top floor apartment and had a beautiful decor. Conveniently located close to everything you would want to do. Harman was very helpful and friendly. highly recommend this location for future trips to Cincinnati.
Just beautiful with perfect location

Harman’s place was great! She went above and beyond and was flexible on check in coming in on an early morning flight.
Literally right next to the park and super close to the new soccer stadium and tons of restaurants. Will def stay again. A+++ host.

Wow! We absolutely enjoyed every minute at Harman’s incredible place! It was the best Airbnb we have ever stayed at! Amazing! The industrial rustic feel, sparkling clean, so quiet and had everything you could possibly need or want. The location was amazing with parks close by and parking is included. We LOVED every minute and Harmon was wonderful with us. Thank you so much! HIGHLY RECOMMEND! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
This loft was perfect for our stay in Cincinnati. Very clean and comfortable. Walkable to many great restaurants. Thanks
Great location with plenty to see and do.
Great location, pretty view, and easy parking for 1 vehicle.

What a great spot. You can not ask for a better location. You are within easy walking distance of TQL Stadium and Memorial Hall and just a block North of a Street Car station which provides access to The Banks area of downtown. With this being located in the heart of OTR, there are plenty of bars and restaurants to choose from.
The biggest thing for me is the parking spot that is included as part of your stay. I stayed on a big FC Cincinnati game night, and finding parking on those nights ca be very difficult.
If I needed to stay downtown again, I would not hesitate to stay here.
Place was adorable and clean. It was even cuter in person. It is 4 floors up. And the parking is tight. BUT there is parking. And the views are stunning.
Great place to stay!

We really enjoyed our stay in this loft. We stayed for 2 weeks and felt right at home. With the added benefits of 1.5 bathrooms, laundry, full kitchen, and a beautiful view the loft felt like a home away from home. The only down side was the lack of water pressure in the shower which wasn’t a huge deal breaker for us and we would love to stay here again. Host was very responsive and dropped off some supplies mid stay when needed. Thank you for going the extra mile to make our stay comfortable.
It is a great place! Close to the park, very lovely walking around. The place itself is awesome, fully equipped. Be ready for some stairs though.
We only stayed here for one night while passing through town, and we wanted to check out this neighborhood. It's a great place in a great location.
The place inside was great. The apartment is above a bar, so there can be some noise below. Overall the neighborhood during the day was fine, but late night it was a little dicey outside.

This was a great place for my husband and I's three-night stay in Cincinnati. Perfect location to walk to OTR, the Findlay Market and from Paycor Stadium. It did rain during our trip so we had to Uber some places, but it didn't cost much since it's so close to everything. The apartment itself was nice and clean. The bed was very comfortable. The parking space was convenient. The only downside was the shower - I'd consider it a trickle of water which made for uncomfortable showers. Overall though, it was a great stay.

This is a wonderful space, super eclectic! It's on the VERY top floor so make sure to prepare for lots of stairs. The apt is beautiful, clean, and communication was spot on! It was a great option especially since you have parking, are close to Washington Park and in OTR! Pricey, but if you can swing it, I'd recommend.

The loft was beautiful and the location was perfect! OTR is a very walkable area plus the loft was right on the street car line, making it so easy to get to and from the ballpark and Findlay Market. Lots of fun restaurants and nightlife close by!

This place is lovely, the view is gorgeous and the location is great for enjoying OTR. There seemed to be a bit of a hiccup with the cleaner running behind and things were not quite clean - but I could tell that likely was not a regular occurrence. I would stay here again, if it weren't for the many many stairs. But for a night away, it was lovely.

Fantastic location. Close to street car station, Music Hall and Washington Park. Great restaurants in walking distance.
Host was replied to all messages. The place looked exactly how it was advertised. If you don’t mind climbing steps, this is the place to be.
Lovely place. We felt right at home and enjoyed the space so much.

Fantastic! Lovely, clean, comfortable loft. Definitely would stay here again. Only downside was the street it's located on was a bit noisy at times, but we knew that could be the case going in so wasn't a problem for us.
Good location and cute apartment

The view of Music Hall was even better than I expected. Personal parking space is amazing for a downtown stay. The place is a couple hundred feet from a street car stop, which can get you within walking distance to basically anything you could want to do downtown. The 4 flights of 1860s style stairs is kinda rough but we actually got used to it faster than I expected and it's totally worth the view. We booked pet friendly but didn't end up bringing our dogs. There was some fur floating around when we checked in, not a problem for us but if you are super anti-dog then take that into consideration. The place is adorable with amazing natural light. My only con is that the shower water pressure is pretty terrible. Personally, I like my shower one notch below pressure washer and this shower is mostly a fast trickle. Regardless, it wouldn't stop me from staying here again because everything else is amazing.

Wow what more could you want. We stayed 4 nights and wish we could stay longer. Beautiful location on the 4th floor with city views from every window. Everything was very clean, looked so cool, and was stocked with everything we needed. Perfect location, we walked to everything our entire trip. Only about 3 minutes from Washington park, we took advantage and spent time there multiple times a day. We had so much fun and so many amazing meals. The food and atmosphere are top notch. The B & A street Kitchen is maybe 5 minute walk and the best breakfast we had. The Eagle and Krugers Tavern, also maybe 10 minute walk, were our favorite dinners. If your looking for a sweet treat it’s quite a walk but Pendleton Parlor is a must try and please go with the side by side. You won’t regret it. Harman is a great host and reached out to us to see if we needed anything and suggested a few places. If you are staying in Cincinnati look no further. This is the one.

We have stayed at many different locations over the last five years. This was our favorite rental property we’ve stayed in. We went to a baseball game on this visit. We were able to easily walk to and from the stadium. We spent part of the evening walking to the local bars and breweries. The location is great for walking to any destination. The nearby park is a great place to visit. The pictures don’t do the penthouse justice. This place is stunning. The views are amazing. The nostalgia of the place is a big reason we booked this place. The place was very clean and very relaxing. I had a special request from the renter. The renter went out of her way to make sure this request was met. Thanks again for a great stay.
Great spot and close to Washington Park!

Very chic place right in the middle of everything - plenty of restaurants, shops, and the TQL Stadium within walking distance (less than 10 minute walk!). Pros - squeaky clean, upscale, walking distance to plenty of things to do, and convenient parking. Cons - low water pressure and night-time noise from the city trolley system.
beautiful loft in the heart of downtown Cincinnati. exquisitely comfortable bed, clean open space and loved waking up to the song of morning birds. would definitely come back!
We have stayed at Harman’s condo multiple time. It’s professionally maintained and never an issue. Highly recommend the place if you’re staying in the Cincinnati area.

We went to Cincinnati mainly to see the Reds but also to see the city. I highly recommend this location. It was super walkable to everything—just a few blocks to Findlay Market (great CHEAP breakfast and coffee spot) and about 1.3 mile walk to the stadium. Felt very safe and the location was quiet. Great place!!
We enjoyed our stay here with our toddler - very close to Washington Park and lots of good restaurants. We would love to stay here again next time we're in Cincinnati
This was my first Airbnb and won't be my last. Good experience all around. Perfect location for a away supporter at a FC Cincinnati game!

Harman's space was comfortable, relaxing, and had wonderful views of the city.
Having off-street parking was really helpful, and it's perfectly located for walking around the neighborhood and having Washington Park close by was really helpful for our dog. We also appreciated the booklet with information about the neighborhood and the map. Would definitely recommend to others.
Great spot in downtown Cincinnati! Looked the location, loved the eclectic apartment and comfortable furnishings!
Perfect location and very nice place, would absolutely recommend. Had everything we needed
Harman's airbnb felt like home! Great location close to TQL Stadium, Findlay Market and Rhinegeist Brewery. Would definitely stay again!

Great place highly recommend it. Great neighborhood close to everything you need. Only issue was needed to run out and buy body wash etc since nothing was provided but not a huge deal. Would definitely stay again. Super cool space and tastefully decorated.
Great host! Located by so many great places! Would absolutely stay here again.
Loved everything about this place!
Beautiful place. Excellent location. I would definitely stay here again.
